query: Could you create a 3-day travel itinerary for a group of 7 that will see us depart from Tulsa and travel to Phoenix from March 20th to March 22nd, 2022? Our budget is now set at $8,000. We require accommodations suitable for children under 10 and would prefer entire rooms. Please note that we do not plan on self-driving.
